title: Elegant Lincolnshire Golf Resort with Two PGA Championship-Approved Courses
description:
Take your golf game to the next level in the lush Lincolnshire countryside with a rejuvenating stay at Belton Woods Hotel, Spa & Golf Resort - an idyllic lakeside resort. Stroll through the verdant and grounds, or venture further to unearth the wonders of the historic villages and towns, trace the coastline, or marvel at the undulating countryside.

Flex your skills at two PGA Championship-approved golf courses with long holes, narrow fairways, and plenty of challenges along the way for both beginners and pros. When youâ€™re not on the green, make use of the tennis or squash courts before plunging into the pool for a refreshing swim. To soothe sore muscles after hours of teeing off and roaming the 36 holes, the onsite spa offers a range of services that offer an indulgent and soothing experience. To cap off each day, visit the Belton Woods Bar & Grill or enjoy a 19th-hole celebratory drink on the picturesque terrace of The Claret Jug.
